learnings.title: Don't Chase a Hot Tip
learnings.news: Regardless of the source, never accept a stock tip as valid. Always do your own analysis on a company before investing your hard-earned money.

learnings.title: Pay Yourself First
learnings.news: Set up an auto debit from your checking account to your savings account each payday. Whether it's $50 every two weeks or $500, don't cheat yourself out of a healthy long-term savings plan.

learnings.title: Pay bills on time
learnings.news: Payment history is the single biggest factor that affects credit scores, and late payments can stay on your credit reports for 7Â½ years.
